title: Modernism - best describes the final sentence

content.question: Which of the following best describes the final sentence (Paragraph 5)?

choices.label: A celebration of the creativity of a group of artists
An attempt to convey the essence of a movement
A claim about the continuing debates over a controversial idea
An expression of satisfaction about the outcome of a conflict

content.answer: An attempt to convey the essence of a movement

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
